Title: Truth and Consequences
Plot: Drew Thompson's widow turns up and gets Raylan in hot water with the FBI, while Boyd's strike at the snake church is met with a surprising strike back.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,violence and sexual references
GuestStars: Jere Burns, Ron Eldard, Joseph Mazzello, Robert Baker, Julia Campbell, Michael Graziadei, Jenn Lyon, Jesse Luken, David Meunier, Abby Miller, Lindsay Pulsipher, Josh Stamberg, Scot Zeller, Caileigh Scott
